reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 339/95: PUBLIC SECTOR (THE CROWN AND ITS EMPLOYEES)
reg_info.reg_name_text: PUBLIC SECTOR (THE CROWN AND ITS EMPLOYEES)

content.content: 1. For the Crown in right of Ontario, subsection 23 (1) of the Act is adapted as provided in this Regulation. O. Reg. 339/95, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the Crown in right of Ontario, subsection 23 (1) of the Act is adapted as provided in this Regulation. O. Reg. 339/95, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The day referred to in paragraph 1 of subsection 23 (1) of the Act is 18 months after the effective date. O. Reg. 339/95, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. The day referred to in paragraph 1 of subsection 23 (1) of the Act is 18 months after the effective date. O. Reg. 339/95, s. 2.
